qs: You are Emily
aw: That is right.

qs: You are Emily
aw: That is wrong. I am Emily

qs: What do you say in the morning?
aw: I say "Good morning."
I greet people by saying 'Good morning.'

qs: Who do you greet first at school?
aw: I greet the teacher first.
I always greet my teacher first at school.

qs: If you meet someone new, do you say "Hello" or "Nice to meet you"?
aw: I will say "Hello."
I greet them by saying hello when I meet someone new.

qs: When saying "Hello," what do you do?
aw: I smile.
I smile to greet people when saying hello.
